name: Fantastic Balls V0.2
description:
Made  for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

You play as "Grean" and "Daniel", Daniel can Double Jump and Dash. Grean Has a Diamond Axe and a Shield. Take them both to the Portal as fast as you can.Be careful of the Pink Balls, they may look cute, but they're dangerous.

WASD : Move               ESC : Pause Menu

1 : Select Grean             2 : Select Daniel

 Space : Jump                  Space : Double Jump

Right Click : Parry

Left Click : Attack
